Html:
For those interested, I ported the Composite WPF Application Library to Silverlight over the weekend, and just ported the UIComposition QuickStart to Silverlight tonight.  I checked on this site right as I was uploading a blog post about it and behold a spike of a Silverlight port of the framework arrived just today!  Figures eh?  Anyway, check it out if you want.

http://xamlcoder.com/cs/blogs/joe/archive/2008/08/05/composite-silverlight-2-0-beta-2-application-library.aspx

Regards,

Joe
